title: Eva Longoria would do Desperate Housewives again 'in a heartbeat'
text:
Eva Longoria is missing Desperate Housewives (Picture: Getty/ ABC)

Eva Longoria has admitted that she’s missing life as one of the Desperate Housewives – and would be up for a return to the life of Gabrielle Solis.

The actress played the character from 2005-2012 in the smash-hit drama, which followed in the increasingly bizarre life of a group of married women and what happens behind closed doors of their idyllic white-picket fence world.

Last time we saw her, she headed off into the sunset to a life of love and arguing with her husband Carlos in a hot tub somewhere far away. So why would anyone want to give that up?!

Speaking on the Global Gift Gala red carpet, Eva told Metro.co.uk: ‘I miss being Gabby. Don’t you miss Gabby? I would do it in a heartbeat.

‘I love the show and I love all those characters and I miss Wisteria Lane.’

Eva’s declaration comes despite her recent revelation that she was bullied on the set of Desperate Housewives.

The actress revealed what she went through in a letter supporting co-star Felicity Huffman through the college admissions scandal, that has seen her imprisoned for 14 days.

Eva revealed she missed the character on the red carpet (Picture: Rex)

‘There was a time I was being bullied at work by a co-worker,’ Eva wrote.

‘I dreaded the days I had to work with that person because it was pure torture. Until one day, Felicity told the bully, “enough” and it all stopped.’

Speaking to the judge about her friend’s character, Eva continued: ‘Felicity could feel that I was riddled with anxiety even though I never complained or mentioned the abuse to anyone.

‘I know I would not have survived those 10 years if it wasn’t for the friendship of Felicity.’

On the carpet at Thursday’s event, Eva confirmed that she also been in contact with her pal ahead of her incarceration.

Desperate Housewives is available on Amazon Prime Video in the UK.
